languages.text: "Это займет время... много времени... и потребует значительных вкладов..." {n}Данрок осекается под вашим взглядом.{/n}
"It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это займет время... много времени... и потребует значительных вкладов..." {n}Данрок осекается под вашим взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib..." {n}Danrok trails off under your gaze.{/n}

"It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}

languages.text: 「時間が…かなりの時間がかかるでしょう…それに相当な資金の負担も…」{n}ダンロックは、あなたの視線を受けて言葉を飲み込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「時間が…かなりの時間がかかるでしょう…それに相当な資金の負担も…」{n}ダンロックは、あなたの視線を受けて言葉を飲み込む。{/n}

languages.text: "Zaman alacaktır... Hem de fazlasıyla... Üstelik büyük ölçüde mali katkı da..." {n}Bakışların karşısında Danrok'un sesi kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zaman alacaktır... Hem de fazlasıyla... Üstelik büyük ölçüde mali katkı da..." {n}Bakışların karşısında Danrok'un birden sesi kesilir.{/n}

languages.text: «Necesitaremos tiempo... mucho tiempo... y una considerable contribución económi...». {n}Tu mirada silencia a Danrok.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Necesitaremos tiempo... mucho tiempo... y una considerable contribución económi...». {n}Tu mirada silencia a Danrok.{/n}

languages.text: “培训需要时间……非常非常多的时间……还需要非常可观的资金——”{n}在你的注视之下，丹罗克赶紧闭上了嘴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “培训需要时间……非常非常多的时间……还需要非常可观的资金——”{n}在你的注视之下，丹罗克赶紧闭上了嘴。{/n}

languages.text: « Cela nécessitera du temps... beaucoup de temps... ainsi qu'un budget coloss... » {n}Danrok s'interrompt net en croisant votre regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take time... a great deal of time... and will require considerable financial contrib—" {n}Danrok stops short under your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cela nécessitera du temps... beaucoup de temps... ainsi qu'un budget coloss... » {n}Danrok s'interrompt net en croisant votre regard.{/n}

languages.text: "Es wird einige Zeit erfordern ... viel Zeit ... und beträchtliche finanzielle Mi..." {n}Danrok verstummt angesichts deines Blicks.{/n}
